mapper.select:
select gu.uuid as uuid, gu.user_uuid as userUuid, gu.group_uuid as groupUuid from groups_users gu
order by gu.group_uuid, gu.user_uuid
mapper.delete: delete from groups_users where user_uuid = #{userUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and group_uuid in (select uuid from groups where organization_uuid=#{organizationUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
